effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black_white: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch.
